textTemplates.name: h_4aaf7d26018a615e4866e9458b80a20a_Pharos_Template
textTemplates.text:
An Error Occurred with Your "DY-STFlow-Wait" Flow

You've received this email because an error occurred while your "DY-STFlow-Wait" flow was running. Debug this flow in Flow Builder.

Error element debug (FlowActionCall).
Debug: end


Open Flow


Flow Error Details

Flow Details

Flow API Name: testnewmp__DY_STFlow_Wait
Type: Flow
Version: 9
Status: Draft
Org: {!$Organization.Id} ({!$Organization.Name})


Flow Interview Details

Interview Label: DY-STFlow-Wait
Interview GUID: {!$Flow.InterviewGuid}
Current User: {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}
Start time: {!$Flow.InterviewStartTime}
Duration: 0


How the Interview Started
{!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName} ({!$User.Id}) started the flow interview.
API Version for Running the Flow: 63.0
Some of this flow's variables were set when the interview started.
$Record = Account ({!$Record})
